projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.summary: Scalable e-commerce solution with 99.9% uptime and 40% faster checkout.
projects.description: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform using Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Implemented real-time inventory management, payment processing, and advanced analytics dashboard.

projects.title: AI Chat Application
projects.summary: Real-time AI chat with 10K+ daily active users and sub-100ms response times.
projects.description: Developed an intelligent chat application with real-time messaging, AI-powered responses, and advanced moderation. Features include voice messages, file sharing, and custom emoji reactions.

bullets: Led development of 5+ production applications serving 100K+ users

Mentored 3 junior developers and established coding standards
Built MVP from scratch using React, Node.js, and AWS
Achieved 99.9% uptime and 2x faster page load times
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%
Delivered 20+ client websites with 100% on-time delivery
Increased client conversion rates by 25% through UX optimization
Collaborated with design team to create pixel-perfect implementations
